atk-s0401a9:1_0: 81. Navamassāpi paṭhamaṁ aṭṭhuppattiyameva kathitaṁ. Sambahulā kira bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṁ
atk-s0401a9:1_1: nisinnā kumbhaghosakaṁ ārabbha “asukaṁ nāma kulaṁ pubbe appayasaṁ appaparivāraṁ ahosi,
atk-s0401a9:1_2: idāni mahāyasaṁ mahāparivāraṁ jāta”nti kathayiṁsu. Satthā purimanayeneva āgantvā
atk-s0401a9:1_3: tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā imaṁ suttaṁ ārabhi. Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0401a9:2: 82. Dutiyādīsu mahato anatthāyāti mahantassa anatthassa atthāya. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
